text:
BOSTON UNIVERSITY
To: LAM
From- JAR
Subject: Correspondence from Williamson
December 1 y 1955
Attached is the cover letter I sent to Mr.
Williamson on December 6. This went with
six Journals and an equal number of member¬
ship blanks.
I'll get another letter off to.him answering
his specific questions, but first I'd like
your opinion on framing an answer to the
local chapter issue. Also, do you think it
expeditious to go into too much detail as far
as current membership figures are concerned?
I'll also send him a copy of the present
membership in his state ... as soon as the
things are run off.
Please let me have the copy of my letter to
him back again. It’s the only copy I have.
jar
